channel.title: Length
channel.description:
Believe I asked this before....Didn't get an answer, so I figured I'de post one more time to see if anyone knew.
How would you change the possible length of character names from 12 to say 20? I believe someone told me it was completely client sided....But I'm not sure what to change, since I'm not all that good with clients.
Can anyone help?

item.title: Length
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
